043af06d-f8fe-4804-b1c5-427e0b929613.description: Effective communication is core to protecting and enhancing our client’s value. Whether they are leading meetings, collaborating with colleagues, or facilitating crucial conversations, our Communication Value Architects™ possess the skills necessary to keep work moving. So, when you need someone to lend a listening ear, or you aren’t sure what questions need to be asked find one of our Communication Value Architects™.
043af06d-f8fe-4804-b1c5-427e0b929613.name: Communication

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this skill badge is required to complete 7 CPE hours of communication personal development through approved Baker Tilly courses.

34b4ed9e-1088-493c-9cdf-961c72465d23.description: At Baker Tilly we use Microsoft tools to get our work done every day, but to set ourselves up for success, all our team members need to understand the basic how-to for using these tools. Those who have Mastered the Basics have gained foundational knowledge about our digital workplace, helping them work better both individually and collaboratively.
34b4ed9e-1088-493c-9cdf-961c72465d23.name: Digital Workplace - Mastering the Basics

badge_template_activities.title: Navigate the digital workplace tips and training with a commitment to put those skills into action to work better.

51db0aa2-a890-486d-8240-4e5d5a53d56f.description: Using Microsoft Teams to connect virtually is our Baker Tilly standard, but now, we’re taking the time to understand how to use it context to our work. From creating a team and maximizing use of channels, to deleting or archiving unused teams, those who Teams Better have the lifecycle of a team mastered and their projects are set up for success.
51db0aa2-a890-486d-8240-4e5d5a53d56f.name: Digital Workplace - Teams Better

badge_template_activities.title: Navigate the digital workplace tips and training with a commitment to put those skills into action to work better.

95c1ef83-58b8-488c-af94-d625d8c8203c.description: Baker Tilly Feedback & Coaching Value Architects™ believe in the power of continuous development. They engage in ongoing feedback and coaching to strengthen the competence of themselves and those around them. This commitment to feedback and coaching provide a foundation for other Value Architect™ behaviors. These professionals are setting the stage now, for tomorrow.
95c1ef83-58b8-488c-af94-d625d8c8203c.name: Feedback & Coaching

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this skill badge is required to complete 7 CPE hours of feedback and coaching personal development through approved Baker Tilly courses.

62b21382-1dfe-4048-80e7-7a5d52e6326e.description: Teams Meetings are a vital way to connect and collaborate in a hybrid work environment. But Teams Meetings can go beyond the basics. From using OneNote for collaborative meeting notes to meeting transcription, breakout rooms and more. Those who Meet Better are leveling up their Teams Meetings.
62b21382-1dfe-4048-80e7-7a5d52e6326e.name: Digital Workplace - Meet Better

badge_template_activities.title: Navigate the digital workplace tips and training with a commitment to put those skills into action to work better.

4ab8e9b9-0846-4e8b-924b-2fe42863aed5.description: Baker Tilly buddies are essential to a positive onboarding experience which is key to integration and retention of our new team members. The first few months at a new organization can be both exciting and challenging, especially in our virtual workplace. The Buddy Program pairs a new team member with an experienced one who can help them integrate in our firm and feel a sense of belonging. The buddy is the new team member's go-to resource for questions about our processes, systems, and culture.
4ab8e9b9-0846-4e8b-924b-2fe42863aed5.name: Baker Tilly Buddy Program MVP

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this skill badge made a notable impact during a new team member’s orientation period and they have been recommended by at least three as an outstanding buddy based on their commitment during the buddy connection period to have a regular meeting cadence, effectively help them understand the Baker Tilly culture and share their passion for the firm and profession.

5d95739f-fefc-4505-a94a-ad6eb1084aca.description: Baker Tilly Professional Network Value Architects™ are builders. They build networks of colleagues, industry peers, and other client serving professionals to create opportunities to collaborate. This network is invaluable in connecting our clients to the solutions that are right for them.
5d95739f-fefc-4505-a94a-ad6eb1084aca.name: Professional Networks

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this skill badge is required to complete 7 CPE hours of professional networks personal development through approved Baker Tilly courses.

c56d0dd0-fda5-48bd-95e2-46173fecf070.description: Protecting and enhancing value is what we do. Each client interaction is an opportunity to build trust and drive quality service that is unmatched in the industry. Baker Tilly Client Interactions Value Architects™ are leading the conversation. Seeking to understand our clients’ challenges and priorities, understanding client value, and delivering solutions that deliver on our promise of preparing now, for tomorrow.
c56d0dd0-fda5-48bd-95e2-46173fecf070.name: Client Interactions

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this skill badge is required to complete 7 CPE hours of client interactions personal development through approved Baker Tilly courses.

7cd969c6-e401-4699-86d5-65b5f983e44b.description: Discovering the power of Microsoft Office online is a gamechanger. Getting files online means better organization, more sharing capabilities, simple version history and on-the-spot collaboration. Those who Document Better are pros at working in a streamlined, collaborative manner.
7cd969c6-e401-4699-86d5-65b5f983e44b.name: Document Better

badge_template_activities.title: Navigate the digital workplace tips and training with a commitment to put those skills into action to work better.

0fb90bb0-3e2d-4828-afe6-d6e5b577bf33.description: Everyone has a different style of communicating and consuming communication, but we can still all get on the same page. Talking better means we are all using our digital workplace communication tools like Teams, Outlook and our intranet to get messages out in the most effective way possible, whether to an individual or to large groups.
0fb90bb0-3e2d-4828-afe6-d6e5b577bf33.name: Digital Workplace - Talk Better

badge_template_activities.title: Navigate the digital workplace tips and training with a commitment to put those skills into action to work better.

acc7369a-b62c-4979-9aec-6429ceab41b1.description: Keeping your files organized, and understanding where to look when they’re not, will save you time every single day. Storing better means getting files in the right place, whether that’s in Teams, OneDrive, SharePoint or on Live, knowing the tricks to quickly find files no matter where they’re stored and putting in the work to get organized making file storage easier going forward.
acc7369a-b62c-4979-9aec-6429ceab41b1.name: Digital Workplace - Store Better

badge_template_activities.title: Navigate the digital workplace tips and training with a commitment to put those skills into action to work better.

db6b2acc-140c-4688-a25c-112615751547.description: A cohort program designed to sharpen business, management and leadership skills at the Manager level. Program Objectives: Gain a solid foundation in business acumen, management, strategy and leadership Deepen awareness of self & others’ strengths, weaknesses and motivators Learn how to effectively lead & collaborate with others in a managerial role Develop an eye for strategy & leadership Analyze, research and solve real-world business challenges Expand one’s professional network
db6b2acc-140c-4688-a25c-112615751547.name: Rising Leaders

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete full three-month program

d34e9904-acb3-4411-9154-5609d1889928.description: Developing relationships in a strategic and intentional manner is a core foundation for a Growth Minded Value Architect. The ability to connect a client’s personal motivations with organizational responsibilities will lead to greater success. Recipients of the Strategic Connector badge can accurately assess the types of decisions a person can influence or make in their organization.
d34e9904-acb3-4411-9154-5609d1889928.name: Growth Foundation - Strategic Connector

badge_template_activities.title: Introduction to Relationship Building
Rate Your Relationships
Know Your Can's & Care's

27543ba7-b393-49a3-a473-fa092adc79b3.description: EDGE is a cohort program designed to develop the next generation of high performing leaders at Baker Tilly. Participants engage in leadership development experiences that focus on their own professional growth and total wellness. Graduates of the EDGE program are poised to lead Baker Tilly Now, For Tomorrow
27543ba7-b393-49a3-a473-fa092adc79b3.name: EDGE Leadership Development Program

badge_template_activities.title: The program prepares graduates to be great Leaders of People. This involves a variety of learning experiences that focus on leading self, leading others, and leading the firm. These three focus areas help produce leaders that create an inclusive environment where they excel at being great managers, developers, teachers, and motivators.

c78b06c7-78cf-4fbd-9f83-a4b9b5d6d882.description: • To be a Value Architect for our clients, we need to possess a foundation of effective communication. Effective client communication means understanding how to earn trust while building credibility and reliability. Setting and managing expectations while matching communication styles allows Effective Communicators to maximize client value.
c78b06c7-78cf-4fbd-9f83-a4b9b5d6d882.name: Growth Foundation - Effective Communicator

badge_template_activities.title: Know Your Customer's Style (DiSC 2.0)
Strengthening Relationships
Demonstrating Reliability
Creating Professional Intimacy (DiSC 2.1)
Minimizing Self-Orientation
The Trusted Advisor and Trust Assessment
Executing the Value Chat

67b422a3-551f-47bf-8598-0306bdc97900.description: • Growth Influencers have demonstrated the ability to develop both internal and external relationships. Growth Influencers understand and effectively engage the preferred communication style of the client to successfully navigate the opportunity. They execute strategy and use client interviews to deepen their relationships.
67b422a3-551f-47bf-8598-0306bdc97900.name: Growth Activation - Influencer

badge_template_activities.title: Relationship & Prospect Portfolio
Strategic Pursuit & Ideal Client/Engagement
The Value Chat
Client Experience Interviews
How to Land & Expand
One a Day

096c1434-15eb-4b30-a2de-e21d53c163ca.description: What do you get when you combine in-depth knowledge about cumulative adjacent services, how those services are related, and how each solution provides value? We can tell you. Our Baker Tilly Services & Markets Value Architects™ are one-stop-shops for information and solutions designed to enhance and protect client value. Whatever it is that you need to know about available services within the current market, you can trust these Value Architects™ to guide you every step of the way.
096c1434-15eb-4b30-a2de-e21d53c163ca.name: Services & Markets

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this skill badge is required to complete 7 CPE hours services and markets personal development through approved Baker Tilly courses.

90fb204c-a2fa-4097-8522-e5ce6b351afb.description: Insight leads to opportunity. Our Baker Tilly Value Architects™ are in tune with the trends and challenges of the industries and markets they serve. This head up approach enables us to bring leading edge solutions to our clients in an ever-evolving world.
90fb204c-a2fa-4097-8522-e5ce6b351afb.name: Business Insight

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this skill badge is required to complete 7 CPE hours of business development personal development through approved Baker Tilly courses.

d68fef24-cfc2-4f59-8f56-1934ce286ae8.description: Our Growth Foundation Influencers have developed the necessary Strategic Connector and Effective Communicator skills to earn and maintain our client’s trust and confidence. The realization that the technical mastery of one’s discipline is not enough in today’s economy coupled with these skills make it more likely that our advice will be taken, we will have more effective interactions with clients and prospects, gain more referrals and generate sustainable growth.
d68fef24-cfc2-4f59-8f56-1934ce286ae8.name: Growth Foundation - Influencer

badge_template_activities.title: Growth Foundation - Effective Communicator
Growth Foundation - Strategic Connector

65234717-8ae2-4021-b513-7677d09ea8fa.description: • Growth Activators strategically advises clients in a manner that enhances and protects the value of the client. Growth Activators execute technical skills by listening, probing and consistently seeking opportunities to add valuable solutions to our clients. With these actions and behaviors, Growth Activators lead growth efforts by motivating and activating growth skills within their team.
65234717-8ae2-4021-b513-7677d09ea8fa.name: Growth Activation - Activator

badge_template_activities.title: Introduction to Challenger
Creating Constructive Tension
Challenger Teaching for Differentiation
Challenger Tailor Your Message

f8111601-865d-4167-a02e-b763ad065734.description: Citizen Developers can create their own business solutions and applications using low- and no-code tools on Microsoft Power Platform. Harness the power of the MS Forms, Power Automate, Power Apps to build forms, connect systems, automate repetitive tasks, collect data or create workflows with drag and drop templates.
f8111601-865d-4167-a02e-b763ad065734.name: Citizen Developer Power Platform

badge_template_activities.title: Create a Power Automate and/or Power Apps to earn this badge.

c7d2cc5c-6b58-41a7-97b2-e087d4776bbe.description: FLEX is a highly impactful executive leadership cohort program focused on enhancing our exceptionally talented leaders’ ability to thrive and succeed during times of volatility, uncertainty, complexity, and ambiguity. Individuals graduating from the FLEX program have acquired the knowledge and skills necessary to transform Baker Tilly; ensuring the continued relevance and sustainability of our organizational strategy.
c7d2cc5c-6b58-41a7-97b2-e087d4776bbe.name: FLEX Leadership Development Program

badge_template_activities.title: This intensive leadership journey for participants includes executive level education and experiences that are connected through applied learning, senior leader mentorship, coaching, and cohort community engagement. Leadership experts, organizational leaders, and executive coaches work together to create a seamless development experience that addresses each high potential participant as a whole person – connecting the principles of interpersonal, organizational, and purposeful leadership.

7086744d-83c4-4873-9bad-d70d20ad6752.description: Baker Tilly buddies are essential to a positive onboarding experience which is key to integration and retention of our new team members. The first few months at a new organization can be both exciting and challenging, especially in our virtual workplace. The Buddy Program pairs a new team member with an experienced one who can help them integrate in our firm and feel a sense of belonging. The buddy is the new team member's go-to resource for questions about our processes, systems, and culture.
7086744d-83c4-4873-9bad-d70d20ad6752.name: Baker Tilly Buddy Program All-Star

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this skill badge made a notable impact during a new team member’s orientation period and they have been recommended as an outstanding buddy based on their commitment during the buddy connection period to have a regular meeting cadence and effectively help them understand the Baker Tilly culture.

b8e1f53f-f21e-45bd-b8e0-15bd94b9daa7.description: Level Up is a 4-level program that develops industry acumen, cultivates Value Architect™ behaviors, and promotes a growth mindset that expands knowledge, skills, and abilities within the industries we serve. A Level 1 Industry Specialist has developed foundational industry knowledge and an understanding of its people, products, services, processes, controls, acronyms, and market trends through coursework, assessments, and real-world experience.
b8e1f53f-f21e-45bd-b8e0-15bd94b9daa7.name: Level Up: Level 1 Industry Specialist - Not-for-Profit

badge_template_activities.title: Industry Foundations: Not-for-Profit: This course introduces the industry and its subsectors, its impact on the overall economy, regulatory bodies, and a SWOT analysis. It discusses the typical organizational structure of businesses within the industry, how the money flows, and key terms. Learners are exposed to the types of clients we serve and the solutions we offer to their most pressing problems. It's complete with a list of resources to further their industry knowledge.

Industry-Specific Courses: A curated collection of courses through Udemy, and articles and podcasts from various sources that provide additional concepts so learners can increase their awareness of the intricacies of the industry.

A selection of courses that support the development of Value Architect™ behaviors, so learners have the skills to communicate their knowledge and expertise effectively, enabling them to build strategic connections that accelerate their professional growth and enhance and protect the value for the customers in the industries in which they serve.

The learner completes a PESTEL Analysis that deepens their understanding and broadens their industry knowledge by examining the Political, Economic, Social, Technological, Environmental, and Legal factors that impact an industry at the macro level.
Badge holders are required to log 250 hours of industry-specific client project work.

5770ebe0-411e-444a-b9c6-4fec71b2b4f3.description: Level Up is a 4-level program that develops industry acumen, cultivates Value Architect™ behaviors, and promotes a growth mindset that expands knowledge, skills, and abilities within the industries we serve. Industry-Specific Courses: A curated collection of courses through Udemy, and articles and podcasts from various sources that provide additional concepts so learners can increase their awareness of the intricacies of the industry.

A selection of courses that support the development of Value Architect™ behaviors, so learners have the skills to communicate their knowledge and expertise effectively, enabling them to build strategic connections that accelerate their professional growth and enhance and protect the value for the customers in the industries in which they serve.

The learner deepens their understanding and broadens their industry knowledge by examining the Political, Economic, Social, Technological, Environmental, and Legal factors that impact an industry at the macro level.
Badge holders are required to log 250 hours of industry-specific client project work.
